sources.title: The Nutty Network (1939)
sources.description: A jungle land radio station run by monkeys pulls a prank by reporting an invasion from space is occurring and a large cutout face is hoisted above the trees so all can see. Fireworks are employed to sound like a war has started. The King, a Lion with a Bert Lahr voice, finally exposes the fakers. Inspired by Orson Welles' "War Of the Worlds" radio hoax. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-nutty-network-1939/

metadata.Plot: A jungle land radio station run by monkeys pulls a prank by reporting an invasion from space is occurring and a large cutout face is hoisted above the trees so all can see. Fireworks are employed to sound like a war has started. The King,a Lion with a Bert Lahr voice, finally exposes the fakers.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Tom Morrison, Paul Terry
